short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switer Safe Browsing is an advanced search engine and homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Switer Safe Browsing is a premium search extension that protects you from malware viruses and phishing.

Switer Safe Browsing is a neat search extension that provides an exceptional custom search experience keeping you safe from malware viruses and phishing, by configuring your Default Search to Switer Safe Browsing.

It provides you safe and secure search experience. We know almost every virus infects devices when we visit a malicious website. Through our custom search engine we only show you safe and clean results.

Not only does it protect your browsing experience, it also includes a virus and URL scanner to ensure that the page you're viewing and the files you're downloading are 100% clean.

You can access the virus scanner by right clicking on the page or hyperlink or by clicking on the extension icon.

Why you need Switer safe browsing:
The modern internet is filled with viruses. You need to make sure what ever you are downloading from internet is virus free. Here this Switer Safe Browsing extension helps you. You can scan any website you think isn't clean before you visit it with our extension. You can scan direct file download links with Switer safe browsing.

Please read this part carefully:
By installing This Extension you agree to install this application, you agree to change your default search, homepage, startpage, and new tab page to Switer Safe Browsing, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. This extension also contains advertisements provided by Adsterra and Monetag.

More Information:
Start by typing preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Switer Safe Browsing will provide corresponding search results powered by Switer Safe Browsing. User-friendly UI and convenience in use will provide you with an exceptional experience. Right click on the page or a hyperlink or click on the extension icon to access the virus scanner.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://waterdropswiter.xyz/
Read more about us at https://waterdropswiter.xyz/add.php
Read our Privacy Policy: https://waterdropswiter.xyz/privacy.php
Read our Terms & Conditions: https://waterdropswiter.xyz/terms.php

To uninstall, go to the chrome extensions page and click remove on Switer Safe Browsing.
